item.title: Real-World Connection Protocol (RCP)
item.description:
Real-World Connection Protocol (RCP)

Summary: Governance filter: ‘Does this build a bridge to Relational or Financial/Professional Sovereignty?’ If not, log as substitution and redirect.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batches 1–5

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
